description: Spend a day relaxing on a private island at the Malamala Beach Club .Enjoy a hassle-free crossing—round-trip ferry tickets.
Visit a local village to experience their culture, food, and social activities Watch a fire dance and Meke performance
included: Entrance fees at the monuments mentioned in the program
Services of a private chauffeur-driven vehicle
Buffet Lunch at a traditional local restaurant
notincluded: Expenses of a private nature like F&B

description: Enjoy the ultimate day out in paradise at South Sea Island in Fiji’s archipelago.Discover the stunning coral reefs, kayak in the lagoons.
included: SIC basis pickup & drop off in bus/coach

description: An incredible encounter with marine life on this ultimate snorkel with sharks encounter in Fiji. It's a hassle-free day with a full itinerary organized for you.
Glide into the sunset during a Denarau Island dinner cruise and be welcomed aboard with a complimentary cocktail.
included: All taxes like Goods & Service Tax
Arrival & Departure Transfers by Air Condition Vehicle

description: Go deep into the wilderness of Fiji on this quad-bike adventure tour. Spend half a day trekking up a mountain ridge  with a guide in the lead.
